import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import useAuth from "../../hooks/useAuth"; export default function Finance() { const [depositInfo, setDepositInfo] = useState([]); const { userInfo } = useAuth(); useEffect(() => { fetch(`http://localhost:5000/deposit`) .then((res) => res.json()) .then((data) => { // console.log("event data", data[0].email); const filteredData = data?.filter((d) => d?.email === userInfo?.email); setDepositInfo(filteredData); }); }, []); return (

DMF Interest Free Loan Scheme (Deposit Dashboard)

{depositInfo?.map((data, index) => ( ))}
Name
Email
Spent
Country
{data?.displayName}
alexshatov@gmail.com
$2,890.66
??
); }
